versiculos.texto: Tsarumuni kwikarieya xapayari[cite: 1842].
Xika, penetsi'u'itsenike 'ateni kemitiyu'itseweki [cite: 1844], matsi 'aixia pi'ane 'anaki'eriya, keyuri winu[cite: 1845, 1846].
Witsimu'iata puwanake [cite: 1847, 1848], pemi'akawiriwa, yemeki 'ekititi pekanihikitini waritsamu witsimu'ia[cite: 1849, 1850]. Kauka 'ayumieme 'iimarixi memenenaki'erie[cite: 1851].

Kene'amexiitiaka, 'ahetsiemieme yemeki kenenayeitia[cite: 1852, 1853]. Kenenanuwitiki pemuyehuputsie, ti'aitame[cite: 1854]. Tepuyutemamawieka ta'iyariki teyunaiti [cite: 1856], tepiku'eriwani kepemiti'amaiwa keyuri winu[cite: 1857, 1858, 1859]. Titaki mimatinaki'erieka panayuhayewa[cite: 1860].

'Uka miyiwi nepihiki, peru witsinepiti'iimari [cite: 1862], 'ukari 'aku Kerutsaremetari [cite: 1863], nekaniyiwini Tseraxi teiteriyari waxamaru hepai [cite: 1864], witsinekatini'iimarika Tsarumuni 'ixuriki kiiyarieya hepai[cite: 1864].

Newaiyaritsie xepikanetsixeiyani nemiyiwiki, tau nenawiyari miyakaniuyurieni[cite: 1865]. Ne'iwama 'ukitsi mekaneniuyeheka [cite: 1866], kaxie haraweriyari 'iwiyariyariki mekaneniuta'aitiani wairiyarika [cite: 1866], meta nekaxie 'aixia nepikatii'iwiyaxi[cite: 1867].

Kenetineutaxatia, 'uki nemimatsinaki'erie [cite: 1867], ¿hakewa 'amuxatsima pepiwaretihiwe[cite: 1871]? ¿hakewa tuka pepiwareti'uxipitiwa[cite: 1872]? ¿Ne titayari netikuyeika xeikia [cite: 1873], 'ahamikuma wamuxatsima wahamatia[cite: 1875]?

Xika 'atsipekatimaika, 'uka witsipemiti'iimari 'ukari watsata pe'uyeikati [cite: 1876, 1877], muxatsi waketate kemireuyuyune kenanukuweiya [cite: 1878, 1879, 1880, 1881] meta 'atsipuri türixi keniwahineni [cite: 1882], muxatsi wahiwemete wakii maku'utsie[cite: 1883].

'Eki meta kepemireuyukuniitia, 'uka nemimatsinaki'erie [cite: 1885, 1886], Kawayutsixi nepiwaraye'eriwa witsimemitehekiniitiarietika yumu'uyaritsie Parahuni kaxetaya memuhaxime[cite: 1887, 1888, 1889, 1890].
Witsipitiyuxexeiya 'a'aurite meta kepemiti'akutsa'a[cite: 1892, 1893, 1894, 1895]. 'Akiipi witsipitiutimerika 'akukaki[cite: 1896].
'Anakitsa tepitiwewieni huruki meta pirataki[cite: 1897, 1898].
Ti'aitame mexi mexatsie 'utika [cite: 1900], witsimu'ia neminetawiri kaniiki'iareni hetsiena[cite: 1901, 1902].
'Uki neminaki'erie, mixaxi witsimu'ia purutsata miyeka hepai kani'aneni [cite: 1903, 1904], netawitsie heikuk- wekaku[cite: 1905, 1906].
'Uki neminaki'erie, 'aukwe tuturiyari witsimu'ia hepai kani'aneni [cite: 1908, 1909, 1910, 1911], 'Enikaritsie kaxie 'iteiriyari hepai[cite: 1912].
Kwinimieme pepiti'iimari [cite: 1920], 'uka nemimatsinaki'erie[cite: 1921]. Witsipepi'ane[cite: 1923]. 'Ahixite, kukuruxi memiyuhuta wahepai pitiyuxexeiya[cite: 1924, 1925].
Kwinimieme pepititemaiki [cite: 1928, 1929], 'uki nemimatsinaki'erie[cite: 1930, 1931]. Yemeki 'eki pepinetsinake[cite: 1932].
'Ixa mitsitsiirawi ta'itari kanayeimiki kepauka temiyutiwitinitsie [cite: 1934, 1935], takii pikaxiyari kariuxa kanihikitini [cite: 1936] Huku mixexeurawi xawariki kananukakitsieka[cite: 1937].
Ne tuutu Tsarunitsie mayeweri mixuawe nekanihikitini [cite: 1940, 1941], xewiti tuturi texuxuri mayeweritsie mieme[cite: 1942].
'Uka neminaki'erie, kepauka hipame 'ukarawetsixi watsata muyeika [cite: 1944, 1945], tuturi texuxuri xuyatsata muwe hepai katiniyuxexeiyani[cite: 1946].

'Uki neminaki'erie kepauka hipame 'ukitsi watsata muyeika [cite: 1948, 1949], xikiti 'itsitsata mikawe hepai katiniyuxexeiya[cite: 1950, 1954]. Kaneninakeni hetiana nemi'etipieka [cite: 1951], witsikatinakakani takariyari[cite: 1952].
Kanenewitini kiita 'ixiarari muwatiwewiwatsie [cite: 1958], muwa yunaki'eriya 'iniariyari kaniwarepitiani[cite: 1958, 1959].
Kaxie takari patsaruyariki keneneutatirikariya [cite: 1960], manitsanaki keneneutahuxaitia [cite: 1962], nekanimiximeni naki'eriyaki[cite: 1963].
Mamaya 'utatana miemetsie nemu'u miniuka'uxipitianike [cite: 1964, 1965], meta yutserieta kwimineniukwenike[cite: 1967, 1968].

Ne mipai nepitixewawirie, 'ukarawetsixi Kerutsareme kiekatari [cite: 1971, 1973], 'uka neminaki'erie maxatsi 'iimarixi yeuta memu'uwaki [cite: 1972, 1974], xepikahei'uximatiaka xepikahehitiaka tsepa kepaukake yukimana manutanierixi[cite: 1976, 1977, 1978].
'Uki neminaki'erie hiwarieya[cite: 1981]. Neuxei, 'ena kanamieni [cite: 1982], 'utsunarimeti hiritetsie [cite: 1983], 'anutitsukwakati hiri 'aminenetsie[cite: 1984].

'Uki neminaki'erie maxa hepai katiniyuxexeiyani [cite: 1985], maxa temaiki hepai kani'aneni[cite: 1987]. Paratsi xekeneuxeiya, takiiwarie warita kaniutiweni [cite: 1988], 'awieniereneti maxawariyarietikata, yiki'iwiyati mayexaxawata[cite: 1990].
'Uki neminaki'erie mipai kanetiniutahiawe: <<Kenanukukexi 'uka nemimatsinaki'erie [cite: 1991], hikimi kenewaye'a, 'uka witsipemiti'iimari[cite: 1992].
Neuxei, kananuyeyaniri xexerixa [cite: 1996], hamatianata kaniutanini wiyeri[cite: 1996].
Yeuta 'ari tuturi kanitineikani [cite: 1997], kwikari tukariyari kanaye'aniri[cite: 1998]. 'Ariri naitsarie kwiepa kani'eniiriikini kukuruxi memeiyiyixawi wakwikari[cite: 1999].

'Ariri piní matiari mieme takariyari kanixuaweni [cite: 2000], 'Ari kaxie xututi witsikaniuki'iareni[cite: 2001]. Kenanukukexi, 'uka nemimatsinaki'erie [cite: 2001], nehetsia kenaye'a, 'uka witsipemiti'iimari [cite: 2002]».

Nekukuru pemeutuxa, 'ai mukatataritsie pemuyu'awieta [cite: 2004, 2005], meta hiri 'amitiumariwetsie paiti [cite: 2006], kenanieri nepimatsixeiya [cite: 2007], keneutaniu nepumatsi'enieni [cite: 2008], 'aniuki 'aixia kanimayaka meta witsipekatini'axexeiyani[cite: 2009, 2010].
Kauxaitsi xekeniwarutiwiya, miki kauxaitsi türixi takaxie memitsewixima [cite: 2011], takaxie haraweriyari xuturiyari[cite: 2012].
'Uki neminaki'erie nehetsiemieme kanihikitini [cite: 2014, 2015], neta hetsiena mieme [cite: 2015], miki yumuxatsima kaniwarutihiweni tuturi texuxuritsata[cite: 2016].

Tau ka'akayuniwekaku 'akuxi [cite: 2017] meta 'etiri ka'akumaweriwekaku 'akuxi [cite: 2018], nehetsia kani'axeni, 'uki neminaki'erie[cite: 2019]. Maxa hepai katiniunanautsani [cite: 2020], maxa 'etsimupe hepai, hiritsie paiti[cite: 2021].
Tikariki, ne'itaritsie ne'ukaiti 'uki neminaki'erie nekaniutiwauni [cite: 2026, 2027], matsi nepika'itaxei[cite: 2028].

Ne 'anukukeme nekaneyeikani kiekaritsie [cite: 2029], huye mayehapanetsie meta mirewatuiyatsie [cite: 2030, 2032], 'uki neminaki'erie nekuwauneti[cite: 2033]. Ne'iwauneti nepika'itaxeiyawe[cite: 2035].
Mekaneniukaxexeyani kiekaritsie tehiwemete[cite: 2036, 2037]. Mipai netiwara'iwawiya: <<¿'Uki neminaki'erie hawaiki xekatehexeiya[cite: 2039, 2040]?>>>

Miya netiwaru'iwawiyakake nekanikaxeiya 'uki neminaki'erie[cite: 2042, 2043]. Nekanitapa, neka'itatuayati [cite: 2044], nemaama kie nekaneiwitikini [cite: 2045], kiita paiti hakewa minetsiwatiniwexitsie[cite: 2046, 2047, 2048].

Ne mipai nepitixewawirie, 'ukarawetsixi Kerutsareme kiekatari [cite: 2051, 2052, 2053], 'uka neminaki'erie maxatsi 'iimarixi yeuta memu'uwaki [cite: 2054, 2055], xepikahei'uximatiaka xepikahehitiaka tsepa kepaukake manutanierixi[cite: 2056, 2057, 2058].
¿Titatihiki makumawetsie miretineika kitsi 'amuweni hepai tiyuxexeiyati [cite: 2059], mixaxi meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia tsata [cite: 2060], meta waikawa witsimu'iatika niti[cite: 2060]?

Neuxei, Tsarumuni kaxetaya kaniyianeni[cite: 2064, 2065]. Haika tewiyari kuyaxi me'eweiyati mana pamie [cite: 2066], 'ixaheritsixi kuyaxiyaritsie mem- anayexeiyarie kwinimieme yeme memiteheuyutakwiwawe[cite: 2067, 2068, 2069, 2070, 2071].

Yunaiti 'ixipara mekanakawitiatikani [cite: 2072], meta mekateniuti'ikitiarieni memeuyutakwiwaweniki [cite: 2073, 2074], yunaiti yu'ixipara yuhiiyametsie mekanikawitiatikani tikariki mikweriwa'aneki[cite: 2075, 2076, 2077, 2078, 2079].
Tsarumuni yukaxeta kaniutawewieni kiye 'aixia mi'aneneki Riwanu mieme[cite: 2080, 2081].

Matiwetika Pirataki kaniutiwewieni [cite: 2082], hurukita mitseiriyatika[cite: 2082]. 'Ipariyarita kaniutawipa tairaiyemeki [cite: 2083], taitana mekaniwaku'utiani me'inaki'erieti 'ukari Kerutsareme kiekatari[cite: 2083].

Xekeniwayekini 'ukarawetsixi Tsiyunitari[cite: 2084]. Ti'aitame Tsarumuni xekenexeiyani[cite: 2085]. Yumu'utsie kanenamaka Kuruna maamaya menamaniri [cite: 2085, 2086] kepauka mutineikixitsie mieme kepauka 'iyarieya muyutemawiekai[cite: 2087, 2088].

Kwinie yemeki pepiti'iimari 'uka nemimatsinaki'erie[cite: 2091, 2093, 2094, 2095]. Witsipepiti'axexeiya[cite: 2096]. 'Ahuxite 'ixuriki pemeukuwera warita [cite: 2097], kukuruxi memeutuxa mepihiki[cite: 2097]. 'Akipate tsipuri xeitewayari pitiyuxexeiya [cite: 2102, 2103] Karaha hiriyaritsie memu'uwa[cite: 2104].

'Atamete muxatsi hekwameki memutixikieni hepai pitiyuxexeiya [cite: 2105, 2106], xike memanatiki me'uka'iyarieka[cite: 2107]. Yuxexuiti miki yu'iwama mepuwarexeiya [cite: 2108], xewiti pikayuxaita[cite: 2109].

'Ateni hiiyame mixeta hepai pitiyuxexeiya [cite: 2110], 'aniuki pinetsihehana[cite: 2110]. 'A'aurite 'ixuriki pemeukuwera warita [cite: 2111], xikiti hixiata mixitekieka hepai pitiyuxexeiya[cite: 2112].

'Akiipi Rawiri tuxiyuya hepai pitiyuxexeiya [cite: 2113], tetexi mixitekietikaki miwewiya [cite: 2113], hetsiena pukuwi xeimiriyari memiyukunarima [cite: 2114, 2115], kimana kuyaxi memiyukunarima miki naiti pihiki[cite: 2116, 2117].
'Atsitsi yuhutati maxatsi yeutari wahepai mepiteyuxexeiya [cite: 2118, 2119], 'iimari niwemama yuhutame muwarayexei memitekwatiwe tuturi texuxuritsata[cite: 2120].
'Akuxi kakiyiriwekaku [cite: 2121], 'akuxi 'etiri katipariwekaku [cite: 2122], nekananutiyeimiki mixaxi yemuriyaritsie [cite: 2123], meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia hiriyaritsie[cite: 2123].
Naiti 'eki witsipepi'ane [cite: 2124], 'uka nemimatsinaki'erie [cite: 2124], naiti 'aixia pepi'ane[cite: 2125].

Hikimi tepanukakine Riwanu hiriyaritsie [cite: 2126], 'uka nemimatsihiawene [cite: 2127], Hikimi tepanukakine Riwanutsie[cite: 2128]. Kenanakaye'a 'Amaná hiriyari 'amanutitewitsie [cite: 2129], Tsenixi meta Heximuni yekirita[cite: 2129]. Kenanakaye'a hakewa mayetsi meme'uwatsie [cite: 2133], miki hiritsie hakewa tiwexi memayu'eririya wakietsie[cite: 2134, 2135].
Ne'iyari pepihia [cite: 2136], ne'iwa 'uka nemetsihahiawe [cite: 2137], ne'iyari pepihia [cite: 2138]. xeihixiyarikititi penetsi'uxeiyaku [cite: 2139], 'akuka xeiwiwieriki[cite: 2140].

Kwinie yemeki witsipa'ane 'anaki'eriya [cite: 2141], ne'iwa 'uka nemetsihiawene[cite: 2142]. Matsi witsipa'ane 'anaki'eriya [cite: 2143, 2144, 2145], winu kemikaha'ane [cite: 2146, 2148], meta pemuyutawiriwa witsimu'ia tixaiti kemikatii'ia hepai pepi'ia[cite: 2149, 2150].
'Uka nemetsihahiawe, 'atenitsie payeneika [cite: 2151, 2152, 2153], retsi meta xiete 'anenitia pepi'awieta [cite: 2154]. mipaita pi'iatika 'akamixate[cite: 2155].

Haraweri tuturi muwa'etsie pekanihikitini [cite: 2157, 2158, 2159], ne'iwa 'uka nemetsihahiawe [cite: 2160], xiete mireuname haraweri tuturi muwa'etsie mireuname meta haixa manukaname pekanihikitini[cite: 2161, 2163, 2164].
'Atsitsi xeiharaweriyari pihikitika xikiti muwa'etsie [cite: 2165, 2166], witsi'aneneti 'ikwaxi [cite: 2167], tuturiyari naaru meta hatsahaxi[cite: 2168],

naiti kiyexi muwatsuayatika witsimu'iatika [cite: 2169], naaru meta 'atsapirani [cite: 2170], karamu meta kanera [cite: 2171], mixaxi meta 'aruhe [cite: 2172], witsimiti'anene xeikia naiti[cite: 2173].

'Eki haa pekanihikitini harawerita mieme [cite: 2177], haixa haa mayeniereniki mi'ayumieme mexeiya pekanihikitini [cite: 2178, 2179], pekanihikitini Riwanu makahaa 'akiyari nena[cite: 2180, 2181, 2182].

Kenanutanieri, 'eka tayeta mieme[cite: 2184]. 'Eka tatsutia mieme, niwa kenaye'a[cite: 2185]. Neharawerita xekeneuka'ekawi [cite: 2186], witsikemitiuye'ia xekeneutawiwiexia[cite: 2187]. Yuharawerita 'uki neminaki'erie kehamieni muwa mieme 'ikwaxi keha'iniata[cite: 2188, 2189].

Neharaweritari nekaninuani [cite: 2192], 'uka ne'iwa nemimatsi naki'erie [cite: 2193], witsima'ane [cite: 2194] muwa nepikaxei mixaxi waritsamu meta [cite: 2195], muwa xiete kwaiyariki ne'iyari paye'axe[cite: 2196]. Muwa nepikaxexeiya waikawa winu meta retsi [cite: 2196], naiti 'iki pitinehetsiemieme[cite: 2196]. Hamikutsixi, xeketenekwaka xeketene'ieka [cite: 2198], xekeneutitariwai naki'eriyaki[cite: 2199].

Ne nepukutsukai, matsi ne'iyari payenierekai[cite: 2202]. Hiki xeime niuki nekaniu'enieni[cite: 2202]. 'Uki neminaki'erie kitenie kanatawekaitini[cite: 2203]. <<Ne'iwa 'uka nemimatsi naki'erie, witsipemiti'iimari nekukuru [cite: 2204], keneneupitia nemeutahaniki[cite: 2204]. Nemu'utsie haitsiki nepumu'uhawi [cite: 2204], tikariki mieme hawiriya nekipatetsie panakaxiriwe [cite: 2206, 2209, 2210, 2211]».
Nematsi nekaniyutikemaripieni [cite: 2212], nekapiyiwe tawari nemiranakatini[cite: 2213]. Nematsi ne'ikatetsie nekaneuyuhauxixianiri [cite: 2214], titayari tawari nereuyukwiemawani[cite: 2215].
'Uki neminaki'erie mireukukekatsie hewakuxawakaku [cite: 2216, 2217], muwa kaneukumeni [cite: 2218], netaita nemeiyehiakaiki waikawa nepinekatemawi[cite: 2219, 2220, 2221].

Ne'anukukeka 'uki neminaki'eirie nekatineuyepirieni [cite: 2223, 2224, 2225, 2226], mixaxi nemamatetsie kanikakukekaitini[cite: 2227]. Ne'itiwametetsie paiti kananuyetsukekaitini mireuyepieriketsie paiti kanikaxiriwekaitini[cite: 2228, 2229].

Kepauka nemireiyepiriri 'uki neminaki'erie, 'ari kaniukumawekaitiniri[cite: 2230]. Neyakaitiniri [cite: 2231], hiki 'utimana nekaneyani[cite: 2232]. Nekanitiwauni peru nepika'itaxei[cite: 2233]. Kepauka nemitahiwi pikanetsiheta'ei[cite: 2234].

Mekaneniutaxeiya tehiwemete kiekaritsie meye'uwati [cite: 2235, 2236], kiekari kuraruyari memi'iwiya mekaneteniukwinitiani [cite: 2237, 2238] waxiani [cite: 2239], nexikuri mekananutihurieni[cite: 2240, 2241].
Ne mipai nepitixewawirie 'ukari Kerutsareme kiekatari [cite: 2242], xika 'uki neminaki'erie hawaiki xehekaxeiya [cite: 2243], mipai xeketenetahiawi kename netikuye ne'inaki'erieti[cite: 2247, 2248].

'Uka kwinie yemeki witsipemiti'iimari [cite: 2251, 2252], ketatineutaxatia [cite: 2253], ¿kehepai timatsiiki 'uki peminaki'erie hipame 'ukitsi watsata[cite: 2254]? ¿Kehepai timatsiiki 'uki peminaki'erie hipame 'ukitsi watsata [cite: 2255], miki pemitatsiwawirie[cite: 2257]?
'Uki neminaki'erie kwinie yemeki pititemaiki [cite: 2259], xetameki 'utimerikati [cite: 2260], tsepa tamamata miriyari muyeika kanimatsiikini[cite: 2261, 2262].
Mu'uya kanihurutini xeikia [cite: 2263], kipateya 'etsiwa kanitutunini wahamatia yiyiwiti kwatsa kemeu'ane hepai[cite: 2264, 2265].
Hixiteya kukuruxi wahepai kani'aneneni 'aki'utia memiyetei [cite: 2266], retsiki me'iwatikaiti [cite: 2267], tetexi witsimi'anene hepai metehekuteti[cite: 2268].
'Auriteya waritsamu 'etsiyari hepai pi'anene [cite: 2269], tupiriya witsimu'iatika 'etsiyari[cite: 2269]. Teniteya tuturite 'atsutsena kanihikitini muwa matineika mixaxi[cite: 2269].
Mamateya huru tepiayari kanihikitini [cite: 2270] tupatsiyuki ti'utikaiti[cite: 2270]. Hukaya putimerika witsimitiharuani hepai ti'uti yuyuawimeki[cite: 2271].

Teuriteya huta 'ikitsaraiyari pihiki 'anuyexawawatiti [cite: 2272, 2273] huru mihikiaki yuwetikaiti[cite: 2274]. Hixiena xika 'uyeikani pumariwekare [cite: 2275], Riwanu muyeikani hepai kariuxa tsata[cite: 2279].
Tenieya kanakakani [cite: 2280], miki witsikani'aneni 'uki[cite: 2281]. Mipai kani'aneni 'uki neminaki'erie, nehamiku [cite: 2282], 'ukarawetsixi Kerutsareme kiekatari[cite: 2283].
¿Kekuta reuyunixi 'uki peminaki'erie [cite: 2286], 'uka yemeki witsipemiti'iimari[cite: 2287]? ¿Hakewa kuta petia[cite: 2288]? 'Ahamatia te'uhuti tepiwauyu[cite: 2289].
'Uki neminaki'erie kaneyani yuharawerita [cite: 2291], waritsamu muye'etsietsie [cite: 2292], muwa mitiwaikaki [cite: 2293], tuturi 'atsutsena tipinike[cite: 2294].

Ne 'uki neminaki'erie hetsiemieme kanihikitini [cite: 2295, 2296, 2297], 'uki neminaki'erie nehetsieta kanimiemetini [cite: 2298], Miki yumuxatsima tuturi 'atsutsena tsata kaniwarutihiweni[cite: 2299, 2300].
'Eki 'uka nemimatsinaki'erie, witsipepiti'iimari kiekari Tiritsa hepai [cite: 2303, 2304], witsipe'aneti kiekari Kerutsareme hepai [cite: 2305], pemimariwe xurawetsixi wahepai[cite: 2306].

Kwi pepikanetsixeiyaniri [cite: 2307], nepeixiyarie 'ahixite netsixeiyakaku[cite: 2308]. 'Akipate tsipuri xeitewayari wahepai pitiyuxexeiya [cite: 2309, 2310] memuyuhayatiwe Karaha hiriyaritsie[cite: 2311].
'Atamete tsipuri 'ukari türixi wahepai pi'anene hekwameki memuti'iwaxi[cite: 2315]. Yuxexuiti miki mepuyuhuhuta [cite: 2316], xewiti yuxaita pika'uyeika[cite: 2317].
'A'aurite pemeuyukunama warita manitsana hepai pitiyuxexeiya[cite: 2318, 2319].

Tsepa haika tewiyari 'ukari te'aitamete wa'iitama memakine [cite: 2320, 2321], tsepa nauka tewiyari 'ukari memihiki ti'aitame hutarieka 'iitamama [cite: 2322], tsepa mekate'iniariti 'ukari 'iimarixi[cite: 2323],

peru xewiti hikia xeikia kanihikutini nekukuru 'etsimupe witsimiti'iimari [cite: 2324, 2325], 'uka kwinie maamaya mitinaki'erie [cite: 2326], 'aixia mitixeiya mitiniwexi[cite: 2327]. Hipati 'ukari kepauka memixeiya 'aixia mepitehehiawe [cite: 2328, 2329], 'ukari te'aitamete wa'iitama witsimemi'anene meta hipati 'ukarawetsixi ti'aitame hutarieka 'iitamama mekaniniawani[cite: 2331, 2332, 2333, 2334, 2335].

¿Kemi'ane 'iki piyiane witsi'aneti tau 'iriya hepai[cite: 2337]? Witsikani'aneni metsa hepai [cite: 2338], muyuawitsie memeukatei wahepai [cite: 2339, 2340], xawatiti tau hepai [cite: 2341], mariweti xurawetsixi mayeweritsie mitiyiyira[cite: 2342, 2343, 2344, 2347, 2348].
Nekaneyani kariu haraweriyari muyema [cite: 2349] ne'ixeiyamiti kaxie miyiyira [cite: 2350], meta manitsana kiyeyariteyari muxutu[cite: 2351].
'Atsinekareyutimaiwekaku [cite: 2355], netemawierikaki kauka kaxetatsie nenekaya [cite: 2356], takiekaritsie ti'aitame kaxetayatsie[cite: 2357].

Keneukunua, 'uka Tsurami kiekame keneukunua [cite: 2360, 2361], keneukunua tahamatia keneuyeikani [cite: 2362], tepimatsiheuxeiyaku[cite: 2363]. ¿Titayarikuta 'uka Tsunami kiekame xeteheuxeiya [cite: 2365], neiya hutakia yu'utima mehewetikaikaku miemetsie hepai[cite: 2367]?

'Uka ti'aitame pemunu'aya witsipemiti'iimari [cite: 2370], witsipitiyuxexeiya 'a'ikate heutawetikaiti[cite: 2371]. Witsipemanupe, nakitsa hepai pi'ane kakaitsie 'aixia reutamaiweti mitiwewiwa hepai[cite: 2372, 2373, 2374].
'Axitemutsi tekixi hepai pi'ane [cite: 2375] winu witsi'aneti mihine hepai pi'ane[cite: 2376]. 'Ahuka tiriku hiriyari hepai pi'ane [cite: 2377] waritana tuturi 'atsutsena mahane[cite: 2378].
'Atsitsi maxatsi tirixi yuhutati wahepai mepiteyuxexeiya [cite: 2379], maxa 'iimari yuniwema yuhutame muwarayexeiya hepai[cite: 2381, 2383].

'Akiipi tuxiyu mutuxa mitse'i kanihikitini [cite: 2384], 'Ahixite huta haixayari pihiki Hetsiwuni mieme [cite: 2384], Wati-Xawini kitenie 'aurie mitineniere[cite: 2385]. 'Atsuri Riwanu tuxiyuyari hepai pi'ane [cite: 2386], Ramatsiku meutaniere[cite: 2386].
'Amu'u waikawa pahekia Kaximeru hiriyari kitsie mieme hepai[cite: 2390, 2391].

Hirumiyitsikimawi hepai pi'anene 'akipate [cite: 2393], 'etsiwa tsiturawime pehewawitiati ti'aitame kwi pimatsixeiya 'aumi[cite: 2393, 2394]. Yemeki kwinie pepiti'iimari [cite: 2396], 'uka nemimatsinaki'erie [cite: 2397], 'ukaratsi witsipemitiuka'iyari pepihiki[cite: 2398].
Kwinie peputewi taki 'amititi hepai [cite: 2399], meta 'atsitsi huta takariyarieya pihiki[cite: 2400].

Ne mipai nepitiuyihiawixi: «Nekananutimakimiki taki 'amutewitsie [cite: 2402, 2403], takariyari nepiini netinayeitiamiki [cite: 2404]». 'Atsitsi kaxie takari hepai ke'aneneni [cite: 2405], manitsana hepai peke'i'iaka [cite: 2406], winu witsima'ane hepai keha'aneni 'ateni[cite: 2407].
Winu witsima'ane 'uki neminaki'erie hetsia keye'ani [cite: 2409, 2410], tenieyatsie ke'utayani meta tameteyatsie[cite: 2411].
Ne 'uki neminaki'erie hetsiemieme nepihiki [cite: 2412], kanenikuwauneni waikawa netsihau- naki'erieti[cite: 2413, 2415].
Niwa kenaye'a, 'uki nemimatsinaki'erie [cite: 2416], yeuta tekaniyehuni [cite: 2417], muwa yiwikita tepeka'iyunieni tuturite yeutamieme tsata[cite: 2418].

Ximeri paiti tepeuhu kaxie haraweriyari tsata [cite: 2419], tepeunieriyu kaxie kareyiyirari[cite: 2419]. Xikari tuturiyari hetixutuweni [cite: 2420], xika 'ikwaxi mayehatsiyatika hexutukari[cite: 2421]. Mana nekameneyetuiriemiki nenaki'eriya[cite: 2421].

Manirakura witsimu'ia kanitawiwiwani [cite: 2425], meta naiti takitenie katinapika 'ikwaxi witsimi'anene hikiketimieme [cite: 2426, 2427] meta 'aiki paiti timieme [cite: 2428], nekametini'utsirieka 'ahetsietimieme 'uki nemimatsinaki'erie[cite: 2429, 2430].

Xika ne'iwa pehikitinike [cite: 2432], nemaama tsitsieyatsie pemutawerixi[cite: 2433]. Kepauka nemimatsi'anukunake nepimatsiku'itsewenikeyu [cite: 2434, 2435], kiekaritsie xewiti pikayiwenikeyu kename 'axaneyiane minerahiaweni[cite: 2436, 2437, 2438].

'Amamatsie nekawieti [cite: 2439], nemaamakie nepimatsi'atianikeyu [cite: 2440], peminetita'ikitianiki naki'eriya hepaitsita[cite: 2441]. Winu nepimatsi'anu'itianikeyu naiti tinikame [cite: 2442], meta 'ikwaxi neharaweritamieme hayari[cite: 2442].
Mitiniyiweniketi nemu'u 'utatana neminiuka'uxipitiani[cite: 2443, 2444]. Mitiniyiweniketi yutserieki mineniuwiya[cite: 2445].
Ne nepixewawirie, 'ukarawetsixi Kerutsareme kiekatari [cite: 2447, 2448], xepika'ihitiaka meta xepika'i'uximatiaka 'uka neminaki'erie [cite: 2449], miki yikimana kepaukake manutaniere[cite: 2450].
¿Kemi'ane piyiane makumawetsie matimie 'uki minaki'erie hetsie rawiyati[cite: 2452]?

Xikiti hetia nepimatsi'anutahitia [cite: 2457], mana 'amamatsie pepikaya [cite: 2457], meta manatsiere pimatsi'utiniwexi[cite: 2457]. Kenena'utiaka 'a'iyaritsie tseyu hepai [cite: 2459], tepia hepai 'amamatsie kenena'utiaka[cite: 2460]. Waikawa pitirikaiye naki'eriya, miki hepai [cite: 2461], kaniyuritini naki'eriya, miki teukiya hepai[cite: 2461]. Naki'eriya taiyari Kakaiyari taiyaya hepai kani'aneni[cite: 2462].

Tsepa haa muwaikawa pikayiwe mitiniki [cite: 2463], meta haa hatia mieme mikumaweriya tima pikayiwe[cite: 2464]. Xewiti xika tita naime mirexeiya tipatamikini naki'eriyaki [cite: 2465, 2466], 'axamitikihiawariwaniki xeikia katinikax- eiyamiki[cite: 2467, 2468].
Kwinimieme yemeki 'etsipuyumate tataru 'uka 'akuxi tsitsiteya pikahanexiawawe[cite: 2470, 2471]. ¿Keteteyurieni xika ta'iwa 'uta'iwaurieni[cite: 2472, 2473]?
Xika kiekari kuraruyaritinike [cite: 2474], heimana tepetayatsakeyu pirata[cite: 2475]. Xikata 'itupari hikitinike [cite: 2476], heimana tepikamanikeyu kariuxa mexayari[cite: 2477].

Ne kiekari kuraruyari nekanihikitini [cite: 2479], meta netsitsite huta tuxiyuyari pihiki[cite: 2480]. 'Ayumieme kepauka 'uki neminaki'erie minetsikuxexeiyatsie [cite: 2482, 2483] kayuwati nemukaxeiya hepai nekatiniyumaika[cite: 2484].

Tsarumuni kaxie haraweriyari kanex- eiyakaitini Wahari-Kamuni paiti [cite: 2489], hipame te'uximayatamete kaniwarehiritiani[cite: 2489]. Miki yuxexuiti mekaniyetuiriwakaitini 'ikwaxi mekaxuxuawerekai [cite: 2490, 2491], xeimiriyari pirata tuminiyari[cite: 2492].
Tsarumuni xeimiriyari tumini kena'iti [cite: 2493], xemeta te'uximayatamete huta tsienituyari [cite: 2494], peru nekaxie haraweriyari nexeikia pitinepiini[cite: 2495, 2496].
'Eki, tuturi muwa'etsietikatsie pemiti'aita [cite: 2499], 'aniuki xeikia mekanita'enieka tahamikuma [cite: 2500], kenetaniu kuta tepi'enieni[cite: 2500].
Xeiya keneumieti, 'uki nemimatsinaki'erie[cite: 2502]. Keneunautsarimeti maxa hepai [cite: 2503], maxa 'etsimupe hepai [cite: 2503], hiritetsie waritsamuki muwiriyarietikatsie[cite: 2504].
